content.en: Immunotherapy advancements: Scientists have been using algorithms to study the immune system in brain tumors called gliomas. These algorithms, such as the ESTIMATE algorithm and the CIBERSORT algorithm, help researchers analyze gene expression and immune infiltration patterns in the tumors. By understanding these patterns, scientists hope to develop gene signatures that can predict prognosis and treatment response, ultimately improving outcomes for patients with gliomas.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for immunterapi: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at studere immunsystemet i hjernetumorer kaldet gliomer. Disse algoritmer, såsom ESTIMATE-algoritmen og CIBERSORT-algoritmen, hjælper forskere med at analysere genudtryk og mønstre af immuninfiltration i tumorerne. Ved at forstå disse mønstre håber forskerne at udvikle gensignaturer, der kan forudsige prognose og behandlingsrespons, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer resultaterne for patienter med gliomer.
